name: The WHAT IS DEEPER Game | Ludum Dare 48 Entry
name_original: The WHAT IS DEEPER Game | Ludum Dare 48 Entry
description:
Ever wanted to rate deep and meaningful philosophy found on blogs, tumblr, facebook, reddit, or anywhere else? NOW YOU CAN! The WHAT IS DEEPER Game offers you the perfect experience to relive the good old days of a teenager by diving deeps into the mind of 14 year olds!

How deep can you go? make sure to select the deeper Meme or you'll lose!
